frontmatter.title: Building Emotional Intelligence and Healing Through Fiction
frontmatter.description: Discover how fiction builds emotional intelligence better than self-help books. Learn why K-dramas, novels, and stories teach empathy and emotional healing through the 'show don't tell' approach that transforms how we understand ourselves and others.
